titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude payments received under the Work Colleges Program from gross income, including payments made from institutional funds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/3/2014--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income payments received by a student under a comprehensive work-learning-service program operated by a work college.
